title: Application of Alternative Teaching Methods for Improving Humanities Education Curricula

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Need to apply interactive instructional methods as alternatives to lecture-based education in mobile-based microlearning environments for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners will analyze themes of literary works and present critical opinions in discussion-based activities.
Learners will understand key humanities concepts through 5-minute microlearning content and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners will review and improve their critical thinking processes through peer and formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
